title: Temporary Disability Accommodation
description: A student has broken their arm and needs temporary accommodations, such as a note-taker, for the next six weeks.

tasks.description: Identify the student and explain the process for temporary accommodations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the need for medical documentation.

tasks.description: Receive the doctor's note and create a temporary accommodation plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a plan for a volunteer note-taker for the student's classes for six weeks.

tasks.description: Notify the student's professors of the temporary accommodations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends official notification letters to the relevant faculty.
